name: TODO List
summary: Syntax highlighting for a todo list
description:
Highlights a basic todo list  

Dates of the form dd/mm/yy are highlighted

Major comments are marked with ==> at the begining of the item
Minor comments are marked with --> at the begining of the item

TODO, INPROGRESS  and DONE are all highlighted differently and if comments are required with the status then these can be highlighted by writing in the form:

**DONE this job is done and this is its comment**

for an example look at
http://www.mth.kcl.ac.uk/~matturry/todo.png
install_details:
copy to syntax folder

to set highlighting of the file to be todo use the command
':set syntax=todo'
